actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

official_title: To amend the Public Health Service Act with respect to the compensation rules under the National Vaccine Injury Compensation Program for vaccines administered before the effective date of such program.

summary.text: Jared Morgan Fairness Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to repeal a provision concerning separate compensation rules for a vaccine-related injury or death associated with the administration of a vaccine before the effective date of the national vaccine injury compensation program.

titles.title: To amend the Public Health Service Act with respect to the compensation rules under the National Vaccine Injury Compensation Program for vaccines administered before the effective date of such program.
